pull.title: Support runtime appearance adjustment on macOS
pull.body:
On macOS switching appearance (Light -> Dark or Dark -> Light) when Bitcoin Core is running makes the GUI pretty unusable.
This bug is especially important when a user chose the "Auto" mode to adjust appearance automatically.

This PR fixes Bitcoin Core behavior.

This is an alternative to #268.

repo.name: gui
repo.description: Bitcoin Core GUI staging repository. Please do not fork unless for development reasons.

events.body:
@goums @jarolrod

Do you mind testing this PR?

Concept ACK 3696ebc873bd71e1a7036200d8f1cf96d262fb9f

Wow! Looks great! 

#### MacOS 10.14.6 (18G8022) Light Theme
![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 4 42 44 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115301157-d475f580-a12e-11eb-9ca6-a4f90a4e3f57.png)

#### MacOS 10.14.6 (18G8022) Dark Theme
![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 4 42 56 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115301122-caec8d80-a12e-11eb-819a-c007bfb51038.png)

This window should probably be aware of the color scheme as well...

![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 5 05 04 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115303322-7ac2fa80-a131-11eb-9457-046f843f77e0.png)

> This window should probably be aware of the color scheme as well...

Leaving it as is because have no nice design solution for now.

Concerning Accessibility: Using Accessibility Inspector on MacOS...

![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 5 29 30 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115305768-d478f400-a134-11eb-861a-5752bd169f72.png)

When inverting colors - the warning doesn't have enough contrast. Maybe in a follow up this can be addressed.

![Access1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115305650-a5fb1900-a134-11eb-92b7-a1b430f53ce5.jpg)

![Access2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/152159/115305396-3e44ce00-a134-11eb-9ebe-7e5e5b759671.jpg)

Concept ACK

Spent all day playing around with this and have some findings. These are the main points summarized:

**The State of macOS Dark Mode Support:**
- This PR does allow for runtime appearance adjustment
- Dark mode does not work when compiled through depends natively on macOS 11 and 10.15. It does work on macOS 10.14 (out of scope of this PR)
- The Linux cross-compiles work, this is important as the release binaries are cross-compiled from linux
  - There is a weird bug with rows in a table, they have their borders colored in white when in dark mode.
- The macOS tool bump would break dark mode again (out of scope of this PR)

**What this PR should fix:**
- Should fix the bug with tables when cross-compiled from linux

Below are pictures of this PR [natively compiled, native depends, cross-compile, cross-compile with macOS toolchain bump [(19817)](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19817)] on macOS [10.14, 10.15, 11]

# macOS 10.14 Mojave

### Native Compile
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 7 25 24 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327233-91327b80-a15c-11eb-98b6-b1948b2594c3.png) |  ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 7 25 48 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327250-97285c80-a15c-11eb-84ca-bb2c92aba09b.png) |

### Native Depends Build
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 7 28 38 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327311-b3c49480-a15c-11eb-9035-1ba33b256933.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 7 27 59 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327322-b921df00-a15c-11eb-8bff-bb1acef5c664.png) |

### Linux Cross-Compile for macOS

| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 41 15 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327486-0a31d300-a15d-11eb-9e56-b57e8c8e4c28.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 41 34 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327497-1027b400-a15d-11eb-989d-adaa068d8c78.png) |

### This PR + macOS Toolchain Bump
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
|  ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 54 03 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327547-2766a180-a15d-11eb-9170-567bc118f1cc.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 54 15 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327565-2cc3ec00-a15d-11eb-921d-7ebd862553b1.png) |

### Linux Cross-Compile for macOS

| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
|  ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 58 48 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327764-80ced080-a15d-11eb-9519-e77f8dce75bc.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 59 12 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327772-84faee00-a15d-11eb-97b5-0f8fa542fe79.png) |

### This PR + macOS Toolchain Bump
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 42 49 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327811-9643fa80-a15d-11eb-9266-279045997661.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 43 00 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327818-99d78180-a15d-11eb-92f5-5ef0787a414b.png)|


# macOS 11 Big Sur

### Native Compile
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-12 at 1 37 45 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327931-cee3d400-a15d-11eb-8f4f-b6aa4612f51a.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-12 at 1 38 04 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115327945-d3a88800-a15d-11eb-8d11-32378eb37d2f.png)|

### Native Depends Build
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 10 51 53 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115330418-fccb1780-a161-11eb-84ca-1c87a6b5f448.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 10 52 11 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115330426-018fcb80-a162-11eb-84e8-5d4721bb3c17.png) |


### Linux Cross-Compile for macOS

| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 27 40 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115329720-b45f2a00-a160-11eb-91e7-fc98da2127a4.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 9 28 12 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115329727-b88b4780-a160-11eb-9303-3082faeb0a1f.png)|

### This PR + macOS Toolchain Bump
| Start: Dark Mode      | Switch: Light Mode |
| -------------------- | ------------------- |
| ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 47 59 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115329751-c17c1900-a160-11eb-8975-f2ca9441977e.png) | ![Screen Shot 2021-04-19 at 8 48 59 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23396902/115329762-c5a83680-a160-11eb-8026-ff296d800a0a.png) |

@RandyMcMillan 

> Concerning Accessibility: Using Accessibility Inspector on MacOS...

Accessibility is out of this PR scope, as its only goal is the smooth runtime switching between dark and light appearances (note that the dark appearance is supported since #154).

I'll be happy to review dedicated prs that improves accessibility. Probably, it'd be nice to start from some kind of a design guide.

@jarolrod 

> Spent all day playing around with this and have some findings.

Many thanks for your extensive testing and reviewing!

> - Dark mode does not work when compiled through depends natively on macOS 11 and 10.15. It does work on macOS 10.14 (out of scope of this PR)

Sorry, still investigating this weird issue.

> - There is a weird bug with rows in a table, they have their borders colored in white when in dark mode.

Is this our bug or Qt's one (upstream)? Is this bug of the switching between modes? Or it was present in #154?
Quickly tested ACK 57373016e6d581e2a0d32b0cfaf8c63d28a9c20b. I've tested this rebased with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21793.

events.body: Rebased 57373016e6d581e2a0d32b0cfaf8c63d28a9c20b -> c231254a65d390a3350fcef456d57e4a6eca0506 ([pr275.01](https://github.com/hebasto/gui/commits/pr275.01) -> [pr275.02](https://github.com/hebasto/gui/commits/pr275.02)) on top of the merged https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21793 -- the dark mode works for every build :)

@promag @jarolrod @Sjors 

Do you mind having a (final) look at this PR after the recent rebasing?

> This PR does not enable the dark mode for builds that have this feature unavailable now, i.e., native builds with depends.

Is this still true after the latest dependency bumps?

@Sjors 
> > This PR does not enable the dark mode for builds that have this feature unavailable now, i.e., native builds with depends.
> 
> Is this still true after the latest dependency bumps?

Good catch! Removed.

tACK c231254a65d390a3350fcef456d57e4a6eca0506 on macOS 11.4

The code changes look sane, but I didn't study them in detail.

_This should also be tested on Linux and Windows_, since not everything is wrapped in `#ifdef Q_OS_MACOS`.

I tested with and without `depends`. I'm able to toggle between dark and light mode in various screens and it looks healthy.

ACK c231254a65d390a3350fcef456d57e4a6eca0506 

Tested on mac OS Big Sur (11.2.3)
Light/dark mode switching works very smoothly on every windows  
Compare to previous version, all icons and labels are re-colorized accordingly to the theme change

Screen capture for those who are not testing on macOS:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5577626/119896943-0a817300-bf40-11eb-8464-a8f11c1e1270.mov

tACK c231254a65d390a3350fcef456d57e4a6eca0506 

Tested over all possible configurations (as i did here: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/275#pullrequestreview-639461197). Also tested on Linux and Windows to ensure there are no introduced visual glitches. This looks good to merge.

> _This should also be tested on Linux and Windows_, since not everything is wrapped in `#ifdef Q_OS_MACOS`.

On Linux Mint 20.1 (Qt 5.12.8) with installed `qt5ct` package I'm able to switch themes for Qt apps during their runtime.
This PR does not add support for such theme switching on Linux though. It ls left for follow ups.
Tested ACK c231254a65d390a3350fcef456d57e4a6eca0506 on macOS Big Sur arm64.
